about_the_game:
“You little troublemaker! Go do your homework right now!” said your parents and put you under house arrest. Try to outsmart your parents and find a way to have fun with your friends.

Immerse yourself in the role of a student who has been punished by their parents for a bad grade at school. Try to escape the house without being caught by your mom and dad.

The demo version of the game is limited to:

• One difficulty mode.

• One time-of-day setting.

• One chance to get caught by your parents.

• No punishments after being caught.

• A movement zone restricted to inside the house.

Key Mechanics:

• 3D first-person game.

• Stealth: hide, stay quiet, and avoid being seen!

• Puzzles: solve riddles, find items, and plan your escape.

• Be careful: parents may notice open cupboards and doors.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game presents a story of a strict and abusive family environment. The father is depicted as being intoxicated with a beer bottle, while the parents engage in harsh treatment of their son. Punishments include forcing the child to perform physical exercises, as well as physical abuse such as whipping with a belt and slapping.

Mature content, such as the parents’ abusive behavior toward their child, is depicted in specific scenes and during interactions between the child and the parents throughout the storyline.
